item.comment: Very bland

item.name: 51st State
item.comment:
Very cool theme, I dig this way more than RftG!
Looking forward to more!

item.name: 7 Wonders
item.comment:
Very fun, everyone enjoys this, quick and easy to teach/learn.
Awesome game

item.name: 7 Wonders: Duel
item.comment: Had fun, would like to play again

item.name: Ad Astra
item.comment: I much prefer this to Catan, the game play is quicker, more strategic and I like the theme better. Good game

item.name: Age of Conan: The Strategy Board Game
item.comment: A very long first game, realized a bunch of mistakes we made near the end that would have sped up the game.

item.name: Agents of SMERSH
item.comment: This game was cool -- it's still random, it's still a story-telling game - but there's more to it than Tales of Arabian Nights. You actually have an effect on the outcome of the game. You win or lose not 'not win'

item.name: Agricola
item.comment: Fun game, hard to explain to non-gamers as there are a lot of things to keep track of.

item.name: Agricola: All Creatures Big and Small
Agricola: Farmers of the Moor
item.comment: Played once solo - was fun, and the peat/forests add a new twist, I like it.

item.name: Alcatraz: The Scapegoat
item.comment: This game is awesome, it gets really tense near the end. I can see having to play with the right group though. Definately back-stabby

item.name: Alhambra: Big Box
item.comment: Very fun and quick, only slow thing is initial game setup.

item.name: Among the Stars
item.comment: What a great first play. We played a rule wrong (ah well) - but it was still awesome. looking forward to being Among the Stars again!

item.name: Android
item.comment: Had fun playing this when it came out, haven't played it in a while though. Theme is very cool, as well as the Stories of the characters.

item.name: Android: "A Golem, To Use the Vernacular"
Android: "We're tracking you in free fall"
Android: Netrunner
item.comment: Been a while since this was played, but fun game and very thematic

item.name: Arcana
item.comment: Really didn't like this, what is the purpose of having stats on a character when all characters are exactly the same.

item.name: Archipelago
item.comment: I really like the semi-coop nature of this

item.name: Arkham Horror
item.comment: Very fun, deep and thematic game. Takes quite a bit of room even without expansions, but still one of my favorites.

item.name: Arkham Horror: Curse of the Dark Pharaoh Expansion
Arkham Horror: Dunwich Horror Expansion
item.comment: Best big board expansion.

item.name: Arkham Horror: Innsmouth Horror Expansion
item.comment: Haven't played with this yet, so it may take the title of 'best big board expansion'

item.name: Arkham Horror: The Black Goat of the Woods Expansion
Arkham Horror: The Curse of the Dark Pharaoh Expansion (Revised Edition)
Arkham Horror: The King in Yellow Expansion
Arkham Horror: The Lurker at the Threshold Expansion
item.comment: I really dig the new gates. And as always, more mythos and outer location cards are welcomed!

item.name: Asara
item.comment: Fun game that my wife likes.

item.name: Ashes: Rise of the Phoenixborn
item.comment: Enjoyed this

item.name: Axis & Allies
item.comment: Not a fan of this, takes a long time and feels like an old design.

item.name: Battlestar Galactica
item.comment: Very fun, one of the family favorites!

item.name: Battlestar Galactica: Exodus Expansion
item.comment: Sad it didn't come with more 'tie in' components for Pegasus, but overall a great addition! Love the new Cylon board.

item.name: Battlestar Galactica: Pegasus Expansion
item.comment: Good additions/changes to the original, the Pegasus and New Caprica boards are a bit small, but overall I like it.

item.name: Battlestations
item.comment: This reminds me of a more complex Space Alert without the CD/timer.

item.name: Betrayal at House on the Hill
item.comment: Fun family game, neat scenarios.

item.name: Biblios
item.comment: Good lite filler. Cool theme.

item.name: Blood Bowl: Team Manager – The Card Game
Blood Bowl: Team Manager – The Card Game – Foul Play
Blood Bowl: Team Manager – The Card Game – Sudden Death
Blood Rage
item.comment: I think this is more of a 3+ game. 2 players felt a little lacking

item.name: Boss Monster: Master of the Dungeon
item.originalname: Boss Monster: The Dungeon Building Card Game

item.name: Ca$h 'n Guns (second edition)
item.comment: Everyone always has fun playing this. Fun party game

item.name: Cadwallon: City of Thieves
item.comment: Great art and components, dull gameplay though. May have to try again.

item.name: Camp Grizzly
item.comment:
This is how Last Night on Earth should be - cheesy and campy (haha) - the game doesn't wear out it's welcome with random card draws looking for objectives.
Theme just drips here, great fun!

item.name: Campaign Manager 2008
item.comment: Received in a trade, not to my taste

item.name: Carcassonne
item.comment: Good game, like these big box collections

item.name: Cards Against Humanity
item.comment: This "game" always devolve into the same thing. penis jokes. blegh

item.name: Carson City
item.comment: One of my favorites, this game is awesome and has it all: theme, hard choices, area control - it's just plain awesome!

item.name: Carson City
item.conditiontext: the board graphic is peeling away from the cardboard, but it is completely fixable - there is no tearing or anything, just the glue needs to be fixed

item.name: Castles of Mad King Ludwig
item.comment: Enjoy building my castles

item.name: Catan: Cities & Knights
item.comment: Adds just the right amount of complexity to the game, won't play the base game without this again.

item.name: Catan: Seafarers
item.comment: An 'ok' expansion, the random land/water setup is a good addition, makes the game more interesting.

item.name: Caverna: The Cave Farmers
item.comment: Very heavy game, but fun

item.name: Chaos in the Old World
item.comment: Great fun, great theme, great chaos!

item.name: Chaos in the Old World: The Horned Rat Expansion
Coal Baron
item.comment: I like this game more every time I play

item.name: Code 777
item.comment: Big brain burner in a small box. This game makes you think, very good deduction game.

item.name: Colosseum
item.comment:
Awesome theme! Light enough for everyone to enjoy, yet deep enough to have good decisions.
Love it!

item.name: Confusion: Espionage and Deception in the Cold War
Core Worlds
item.comment: Love the theme, the cards are great and gameplay is fun. Each expansion adds just the right amount of stuff.

item.name: Core Worlds: Galactic Orders Promo Pack
Cosmic Encounter
item.comment: I love the variance in this game. The interactions are great, completely new games each time its played. Love it.

item.name: Cowboys: The Way of the Gun
Cutthroat Caverns
item.comment: Great game, made better by the expansions!

item.name: Cutthroat Caverns: Relics & Ruin
item.comment: Love the inclusion of Relics!

item.name: Cyclades
item.comment: Great theme, want to play this a few more times, rating may change.

item.name: Dead of Winter: A Crossroads Game
Dixit
item.comment: Lots of fun, rating may change after playing a few times. More expansions would definitely make this games re playability last for a very long time.

item.name: Dominion
item.conditiontext: Played a few times, in good condition

item.name: Doom: The Boardgame
item.comment: Team Balance again is an issue as with Descent, but this one plays quicker and is more frantic.

item.name: Draco Magi
item.conditiontext: Extra copy of KS - including playmat, foils and oriental dragon

item.name: Dragon Rampage
item.comment: Another example of a horrible rule book. It's sad that a game as simple as this should have to have so many rules questions. The game is quite fun though!

item.name: Drum Roll
item.conditiontext: box top is dished a little in one corner

item.name: Dungeon Lords
item.comment: Lots of reading to be done to learn this game, but boy is it fun!

item.name: DungeonQuest (third edition)
item.comment: Really like this game, rating may drop after a few plays because of the amount of cards, but really fun to try and get treasure.

item.name: Egizia
item.comment: Very cool theme, nice worker placement - very cool game

item.name: Eldritch Horror
item.comment:
This game is what I always wanted Arkham Horror to be.
It's still long, but very thematic - much more so than Arkham.
They are two different games still, but I'll always play this one over Arkham

item.name: Endeavor
item.comment:
Puerto Rico 1.2 - This game has really cool stuff going for it. I like a lot of things about it and have only one thing negative to say.. Setup is crazy. so many tokens to put out randomly, buildings to sort, etc.
Great fun though!

item.name: Epic Spell Wars of the Battle Wizards: Duel at Mt. Skullzfyre
Epic Spell Wars of the Battle Wizards: Duel at Mt. Skullzfyre – Haggatha the Heffer's Crushazorian Godstorm (promo)
Epic Spell Wars of the Battle Wizards: Rumble at Castle Tentakill
Escape: The Curse of the Temple
Evo (second edition)
item.comment: Rawr! I like this game a lot, and I like it a lot better with the more 'serious' art. It adds something to the game and am saddened to hear people don't like it! :)

item.name: Felix: The Cat in the Sack
Food Fight
item.conditiontext: Played a few times, in good condition

item.name: Fortune and Glory: The Cliffhanger Game
Founding Fathers
item.comment: I like this game! Very informational, and some neat mechanics, good strategy etc. Fun!

item.name: Fresco
item.comment: Beautiful game, good gameplay. Wish it supported more than 4.

item.name: Galaxy Trucker
item.comment: Great fun, good family game. Enjoy the explosions and humor a lot. Would like to see more Cards, longer trips (Round 4, 5?) More Round 1,2,3 cards just for variety, and maybe a few more tokens, ;)

item.name: Galaxy Trucker: The Big Expansion
item.comment: Added great stuff, more more!

item.name: A Game of Thrones: A Clash of Kings Expansion
A Game of Thrones: A Storm of Swords Expansion
A Game of Thrones: The Board Game (Second Edition)
A Game of Thrones: The Card Game
item.comment: Currently one of the favorites. Great fun with 3-4 players.

item.name: Gears of War: The Board Game
item.comment: Love the 360 games, this game really brings the theme through. Everything plays very cleanly and the no GM is great. Needs big box expansions though, more characters from the series, more minis, etc.

item.name: Ghost Stories
item.comment: VERY hard game, very enjoyable

item.name: Ghost Stories: White Moon
item.comment: Adds some cool new stuff

item.name: Giants
item.comment: Much more fun than the first time I played. I enjoy this and am glad I picked it up again.

item.name: Haggis
item.comment: Great trick-taking game.

item.name: Hansa Teutonica
item.comment: Just can't get into the theme. Mechanically sound, but getting put into offices around europe.... meh..

item.name: Le Havre
item.comment: I like the theme better than Agricola. Overall a better game in my opinion. Turns can go much much quicker as well if everyone knows what they're doing. 3 player game in around 2 hours.

item.name: Le Havre Expansion: Essen Promo Cards
Le Havre: Le Grand Hameau
item.comment: Anything adding more variety to a game gets a thumbs up from me.

item.name: High Frontier
item.comment: I love the sci-fi non-fiction going on here. Very cool gameplay, the rules are complex, but once learned are fun fun fun!

item.name: High Frontier Expansion
item.comment: The addition of the extra cards and map was a necessity! It adds quite a bit more to this game and makes it very interesting.

item.name: The Hunger Games: District 12 Strategy Game
In the Year of the Dragon
Infinite City
item.comment: Nice game, have only played 2 players, more would be intense.

item.name: Infinite City: Guild Hall and Salvage Yard
Isla Dorada
item.comment: Fun family game.

item.name: Jambo
item.comment: Very fun game, short-medium length for 2 players
item.conditiontext: would like to trade as a set

item.name: Jambo Expansion
item.conditiontext: would like to trade as a set

item.name: Jambo Expansion 2
item.conditiontext: would like to trade as a set

item.name: Kill Doctor Lucky
item.comment: Great family fun, may run a little long sometimes, but still good.

item.name: Kingdom Death: Monster
item.comment: Brutal.. I love it!

item.name: Last Night on Earth 'Radioactive Grave Dead' supplement
Last Night on Earth 'Revenge of the Dead' Supplement
Last Night on Earth 'Zombie Pillage' Supplement
Last Night on Earth: Growing Hunger
item.comment: Great character and card additions!

item.name: Last Night On Earth: Hero Pack One Expansion
item.originalname: Last Night on Earth: Hero Pack 1

item.name: Last Night on Earth: Stock Up
Last Night on Earth: Survival of the Fittest
Last Night on Earth: The Zombie Game
item.comment: just lost interest.

item.name: Last Night on Earth: Zombies with Grave Weapons Miniature Set
Leaders of Small World
item.comment: Not as good as the other two small expansions, but still a nice addition.

item.name: Legacy: The Testament of Duke de Crecy
Letters from Whitechapel
item.comment:
Very fun, challenging and tense experience.
Long play time. This game is prone to AP as 'Jack' tries to outthink the other players and vice-versa.
The game is super fun though.

item.name: Lifeboat
item.comment: Rules need work. other than that, just haven't found time to play this.

item.name: Long Shot
item.comment: The luck factor is extremely high, but it plays fairly quick.

item.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game
item.comment: Fun game, way easier multi player, but still a fun solo game.

item.name: Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation (Deluxe Edition)
Mage Knight Board Game: Krang Character Expansion
Mage Knight Board Game: Shades of Tezla Expansion
Mage Knight Board Game: The Lost Legion
Mage Tower, A Tower Defense Card Game
Mage Wars
item.comment: Very interesting mix of Summoner Wars (moving around a board) and M:tG. I really like the idea of your wizard being your avatar, so this fits up my alley. I also like the strategic implementation instead of just a 'i attack you block'

item.name: Mascarade
item.comment: Needs 5+ players to be fun

item.name: Mundus Novus
item.comment: Another example of a rulebook laid out very poorly. Lots of references to stuff you don't find out until later in the rules. Thankfully they're short. They could have included a simple (see page #) to stop the flipping back and forth.

item.name: Mwahahaha!
item.comment: Munchkin-y feel to it, but overall good theme and good player interaction.

item.name: Mystery Express
item.comment: Clue on a train, on crack and heroin. This game is crazy!

item.name: Mystery of the Abbey
item.comment: Clue in a monastery.

item.name: Nightfall
item.comment: Felt kind of unwieldy not knowing how the chaining/combos worked, but after a few rules were re-read, looking forward to trying again.

item.name: Ninja: Legend of the Scorpion Clan
No Thanks!
item.comment: Very fast, fun and lite. This game is worth every dollar! Fun with any group of people.

item.name: Nuns on the Run
item.comment: Only downside is it needs a lot of players, but really fun!

item.name: Once Upon a Time: Dark Tales
item.comment: Great addition

item.name: Once Upon a Time: The Storytelling Card Game
item.comment: Very fun and quick! great laughs had by all.

item.name: Outpost
item.comment: Math's is hardz. My oh my, I haven't played this in a while, but near the end you're making a few hundred bucks and having to add and subtract 1 here, 45 there it gets kinda crazy.

item.name: Pandemic
item.comment: Reminds me of 12 Monkeys, great movie. However this game has the feeling of 'meh, I could play that, but I'd rather play something else' It is more of a puzzle solver, this game SHOULD be tense. I don't feel threatened, I don't feel tense. Random chance destroying your plans isn't tense or suspenseful.

item.name: Pandemic: On the Brink
item.comment: Cool containers, nice replacement pieces, new variants, harder difficulty. What's not to like?

item.name: Panic Station
item.comment: This game fell flat -- too many questions and no tension. I had really high hopes for this and it just didn't work.

item.name: Panic Station: Survival Kit Mini Expansion
Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Rise of the Runelords – Base Set
Peloponnes
item.comment: Very tight light civ game. It has some hard choices and your people will probably starve. Ah well....

item.name: The Phantom League
item.comment:
This game is an interesting one. Fast turns, until battle. Which becomes an issue, lots of little rule questions we had to answer ourselves.
Fun, but wanting more clarifications etc.

item.name: The Phantom League: Mostly Harmless Promo Deck
The Pillars of the Earth
item.comment: Building a church, This one was fun for a while, seems very 'lite' now.

item.name: The Pillars of the Earth: Expansion Set
item.conditiontext: Can only trade with base game.

item.name: Pirate's Cove
item.comment: Battlestar just recently surpassed this on my dad's favorite game list. Loved this game until he played BSG.

item.name: Pirates of the Spanish Main: Shuffling the Deck
Power Grid
item.comment: Great game, have fun every time we play.

item.name: Power Grid: The New Power Plant Cards
Railways of the World: The Card Game
Rattus
item.comment: Quick, lite game, very fun and thematic.

item.name: Red November
item.comment: Fun game for a while, the re-playability goes down after you figure out how to 'win.' More fun with more players. Definately more fun with more players

item.name: The Republic of Rome
item.comment:
9 hour games don't normally sound interesting to me but I played this and was totally enthralled the entire time. I felt like there was something I could always do and was always engaged even when it wasn't 'my turn'.
Sadly, I own it, and probably wont ever get to play it.

item.name: The Resistance
item.comment: Very quick and fun. Easy to teach/learn, a great way to start the evening.

item.name: Revolution!
item.comment: I really like the blind bidding in this. Simple game mechanic makes it fun.

item.name: Revolver
item.comment: This gets better the more I play it!

item.name: Revolver Expansion 1.1: Ambush on Gunshot Trail
Revolver Expansion 1.2: Hunt the Man Down
Revolver: By the Gun They Died
Rex: Final Days of an Empire
Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island
Runebound (Second Edition)
item.comment: I like this game, the encounters, etc are great too.

item.name: Scripts and Scribes: The Dice Game
Sentinels of the Multiverse
item.comment: The enhanced edition is the way to go, it makes everything better!

item.name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Ambuscade Villain Character
Sentinels of the Multiverse: Cosmic Omnitron Villain Promo Card
Sentinels of the Multiverse: Infernal Relics
Sentinels of the Multiverse: Mad Bomber Blade Villain Promo Card
Sentinels of the Multiverse: Ra, Horus of Two Horizons Promo Card
Sentinels of the Multiverse: Redeemer Fanatic Promo Card
Sentinels of the Multiverse: Rook City
Sentinels of the Multiverse: Rook City – The Wraith Promo Card
Sentinels of the Multiverse: Unity Hero Character
Sentinels of the Multiverse: Young Legacy Promo Card
The Settlers of Catan: 5-6 Player Extension
The Settlers of Catan: The Great River
Shadow Hunters
item.comment: Fun party game! more players would be great fun

item.name: Shadow Hunters Expansion Kit
item.comment: Character variety adds quite a bit to this game! Good stuff.

item.name: Shadows over Camelot
item.comment: King Arthur? Check. Excalibur? Check. Round Table? Check. Merlin? Check. Traitor? ... ?? Check! Fun game, interesting pre-cursor to Battlestar. Love the Arthur mythology and one of my favorites.

item.name: Shadows over Camelot: Merlin's Company
item.comment: I like the added difficulty, good stuff here!

item.name: Shazamm!
item.comment: Fun lite two player game.

item.name: Shear Panic!
item.comment: Cute abstract game with an awesome pasted on theme.

item.name: Sid Meier's Civilization: The Board Game
Small World
item.comment: It is indeed a small world, but fun! Simple warfare (higher number wins) but quick play time and the theme is great.

item.name: Small World: Grand Dames of Small World
Space Alert
item.comment: Fun and exciting. The random mission generator provided on BGG is a must have.

item.name: Space Hulk: Death Angel – The Card Game
item.comment: WH:40k one of my favoritist themes. Tyranids are the greatest aliens (and they look like THE Alien) -- great story. Cool co-op, very hard, tense with just enough luck thrown in.

item.name: Space Hulk: Death Angel – The Card Game – Deathwing Space Marine Pack
Space Hulk: Death Angel – The Card Game – Mission Pack 1
Space Hulk: Death Angel – The Card Game: Space Marine Pack 1
Space Hulk: Death Angel – The Card Game: Tyranid Enemy Pack
Spartacus: A Game of Blood & Treachery
Stone Age: Style is the Goal
Stronghold
item.comment: Haven't played this yet, dying to get it to the table. Looks great!

item.name: Supernova
item.comment: My wife likes this game because 'the pretty colors' - The stylized Card Art is indeed interesting, but something seems lacking to me.

item.name: Survive: Escape from Atlantis! 5-6 Player Mini Expansion
Survive: Escape from Atlantis! The Giant Squid Mini Expansion
Takenoko
item.comment: Cute game, some rules issues, but overall fun.

item.name: Tales & Games: The Three Little Pigs
Tammany Hall
item.comment: Awesome blind bidding game. Lots of sneakery going on

item.name: Thunderstone
item.comment: Very cool, my first choice for playing a light weight - yet strategic card game.

item.name: Thurn and Taxis
item.comment: Fun game, but already have my share of worker placement games.

item.name: Thurn and Taxis: Power and Glory
Tide of Iron
item.comment: Haven't played this in a long time, hard to find a wargamer to play with, but had a blast (no pun intended) when played

item.name: Tide of Iron: Days of the Fox
Tide of Iron: Designer Series Vol. 1
Timeline: Discoveries
item.comment: Nice game, fun, light and educational

item.name: A Touch of Evil 'The Allies' Supplement
A Touch of Evil ‘The Madness' Game Supplement
A Touch of Evil: Hero Pack 1
item.comment: Cool new heroes, new villian

item.name: A Touch of Evil: Something Wicked Expansion
item.comment: Nice new board, great additions, adds a lot to the base game. Bring on expansion 2!

item.name: A Touch of Evil: The Supernatural Game
item.comment: Fun game, Arkham Lite (but in a good way!). Can easily play this within two hours as opposed to the 3-5 required for AH.

item.name: Troyes
item.comment: Kingsburg with lots of strategy and better theme

item.name: Twilight Imperium (Third Edition)
item.comment: Every time I play this I remember why it's so awesome. Epic ness in a box.

item.name: Twilight Imperium (Third Edition): Shards of the Throne
item.comment:
I love the political stuff added here.
New races are awesome - overall another great expansion

item.name: Twilight Imperium (Third Edition): Shattered Empire
item.comment: Adds some serious coolness to this game, had fun playing with the expansion stuff.

item.name: Vinhos
item.comment: Oh man, my brain hurts after playing this game. It has really hard choices and so many paths to get victory points, and things that require other things, and other things.. *fzzzt*

item.name: The Walking Dead: The Board Game
Wiz-War (eighth edition)
item.comment: Fun and didn't last too long, would benefit from some expansion content though

item.name: Yggdrasil Second Edition with Asgard Expansion
Yomi
item.comment: Street Fighter the card game - this game is really fun and way more strategic than it may seem. Lots of bluffing and combos to use.
